name: Current Time UTC
expression: Business Goal: Returns the current date and time in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) format.
This measure is volatile and refreshes with every visual interaction in the report.
It returns formatted text suitable for direct use in visualizations as a timestamp indicator.
Important Note: This measure is recalculated every time the data model is refreshed
or when any visual interaction occurs, which may impact report performance in large models.
UTCNOW: Returns the current date and time in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).
This function is volatile and returns a different value each time it's evaluated.
TIME: Creates a time value from hours, minutes, and seconds.
Here, TIME(1,0,0) adds 1 hour to the UTC time. This appears to be adjusting
for a specific time zone offset (e.g., UTC+1 for Central European Time).
Note: If pure UTC is needed without offset, remove the TIME addition.
FORMAT: Converts a value to text according to the specified format string.
For European format, use: "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss" (24-hour format)
